Mortal Will.name: Mortal Will
Mortal Will.blurb: After five basic attacks or ability cast, Pantheon's next basic ability (Q, W, or E) is empowered.
Mortal Will.description: Innate: Pantheon gains a stack of Mortal Will when he lands a basic attack  on-hit or casts an ability, up to a maximum of 5. At 5 stacks, Pantheon's next basic ability consume the stacks to grant additional effects.
Mortal Will.description2: Pantheon gains full stacks upon starting the game and upon respawning.

Comet Spear.name: Comet Spear
Comet Spear.blurb: Tap: Pantheon strikes in a direction, damaging all enemies in a line. Hold: Pantheon throws his spear in a line. Empowered: Enemies take extra damage and are slowed.
Comet Spear.description: First Cast: Pantheon winds up for up to 4 seconds, increasing Comet Spear's range while being  slowed by 10%.
Comet Spear.description2: Second Cast: Pantheon hurls his spear, dealing  physical damage to all enemies hit, increased against enemies below 20% of their maximum health but reduced by 30% against  minions and by 50% against enemies beyond the first.
Comet Spear.description3: Releasing the ability within 0.35 seconds causes Pantheon to instead thrust his spear forward, dealing the same physical damage to all enemies hit and refunding 50% of Comet Spear's  cooldown. The thrust's damage is not reduced against enemies beyond the first.
Comet Spear.description4: If Pantheon is  interrupted during the charge, or the charge completes without reactivation, Comet Spear is cancelled and the ability is put on full cooldown but refunds  half the mana cost.
Comet Spear.description5: Mortal Will: Deals an additional 20 − 240 (based on level) (+ 100% bonus AD) bonus physical damage, affected by the previous damage reductions, to all enemies hit and  slows them for 2.5 seconds.

Shield Vault.name: Shield Vault
Shield Vault.blurb: Pantheon leaps to a target enemy, dealing damage and stunning them. Empowered: Pantheon's next basic attack hits three times, each at reduced damage.
Shield Vault.description: Active: Pantheon  dashes to the target enemy unit, dealing them physical damage and  stunning them for 1 second.
Shield Vault.description2: Mortal Will: Pantheon's next basic attack within 4 seconds strikes his target 3 times, dealing 45% − 55% (based on level) AD physical damage per hit, up to 135% − 165% (based on level) AD. Each hit is affected by  critical strike modifiers and applies on-hit effects.
Shield Vault.description3: The Empowered Shield Vault resets Pantheon's basic attack timer.
Shield Vault.description4: The ability can be dodged if the target moves 800 units away.
Shield Vault.description5: Pantheon will attempt to automatically basic attack his target at the end of the dash.
Shield Vault.notes:
* Applies  spell damage on the initial vault. Deals  default damage on the additional attacks from the empowered ability.
 The 3 strikes that occurs after Empowered Shield Vault each apply a stack of  Mortal Will.
 If Shield Vault is used without Mortal Will beyond Pantheon's basic attack range, the auto attack following will not grant any stack of  Conqueror,  Electrocute,  Phase Rush or  Spellthief's Edge.
 PENDING FOR TEST:  Enhanced Shield Vault's interactions with  dodging,  blocking, and  blinding effects.

Aegis Assault.name: Aegis Assault
Aegis Assault.blurb: Pantheon sets his shield in a direction, gaining invulnerability to damage from enemies in that direction and dealing damage continuously. The last hit is extra powerful and still activates if E is canceled early. Empowered: Aegis Assault lasts longer.
Aegis Assault.description: Active: Pantheon braces his shield in the target direction for 1.5 seconds, during which he is  slowed for between 0% − 50% (based on his movement direction). Aegis Assault can't be  interrupted.
Aegis Assault.description2: For the duration, Pantheon is  invulnerable against damage dealt by enemies ( turrets included) from the target direction, and deals[ up to 100% AD physical damage over the duration ][ 8.3% AD physical damage every 0.125 seconds ] in a cone to all enemies struck, reduced by 50% against  minions.
Aegis Assault.description3: At the end of the duration or upon reactivation after 0.3 seconds, Pantheon slams with his shield after a 0.25-second delay, dealing physical damage.
Aegis Assault.description4: Mortal Will: Aegis Assault's duration is increased to 2.5 seconds, dealing[ up to 166.6% AD physical damage over the duration ][ 8.3% AD physical damage every 0.125 seconds ].
Aegis Assault.notes:
*  Blink ability damage is calculated before the displacement.
 The self-slow is affected by  slow resist.
  Spell shield will only block the slam's damage.

Grand Starfall.name: Grand Starfall
Grand Starfall.blurb: Pantheon leaps into the air and then hurtles back toward a target location, damaging enemies as he passes through. Mortal Will activates immediately when he lands.
Grand Starfall.description: Active: Pantheon channels for 2 seconds to leap high into the air, then marks and  reveals his destination before crashing down along the target area 2.7 seconds later. He remains  vanished until the landing is complete.
Grand Starfall.description2: The landing deals  magic damage, decreased by up to 50% at the edges of the area.
Grand Starfall.description3: Grand Starfall instantly readies  Mortal Will.
Grand Starfall.description4: Grand Starfall's  cooldown is reduced to 30 seconds if the channel is  interrupted.
Grand Starfall.notes:
* PENDING FOR TEST: Grand Starfall's  interactions with  The Hextech Ultimatum, buff and debuff retention, and  untargetability bypasses (e.g,  Tempered Fate,  Realm Warp,  Nexus Obelisk's turret laser).
 Abilities that target Pantheon will redirect to the last location.
  Umbral Trespass will damage Pantheon during the travel, but will stay at the previous location.

 Pinging the ability will inform allies in chat which  visible  enemy champions are in range of Grand Starfall.
